results.title: Mitochondria-Modulating Liposomes Reverse Radio-Resistance for Colorectal Cancer.
results.text_hl: This finding guided to discover that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Deoxyglucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003847 @@@2-DG@@@ are synergistic in reversing @<m>DISEASE_Radio_renal_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536267 @@@radio resistance@@@ by inhibiting p-@GENE_EIF2A @GENE_229317 @@@eIF2alpha@@@ and @GENE_ATF4 @GENE_11911 @@@ATF4@@@.

citations.NLM: Li J, Wang Y, Shen W, Zhang Z, Su Z, Guo X, Pei P, Hu L, Liu T, Yang K, Guo L. Mitochondria-Modulating Liposomes Reverse Radio-Resistance for Colorectal Cancer. Adv Sci (Weinh). 2024 Mar 23;():e2400845. PMID: 38520732
